<CodeGroup>
  ```python Python
  # Add timeout and error handling
  try:
      with client.Session(
          cdp_url=cdp_url,
          timeout_minutes=15  # Longer timeout
      ) as session:
          page = session.page
          page.goto("https://example.com")
  except Exception as e:
      print(f"CDP connection failed: {e}")
      # Handle error or retry
  ```
</CodeGroup>
